sense.def:
A lease
je zakonski sporazum, po katerem nekdo plača za uporabo neke stavbe ali zemljišča v določnem obdobju.

seg.quote: The house was let on a 99-year lease.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
leases property from someone
, od nekoga dobi dovoljenje za uporabo njegove lastnine v zameno za plačilo; kadar nekdo
leases property to someone
, nekomu da tako dovoljenje.

cit.quote: najeti, vzeti v najem; dati v najem

seg.quote: They leased a house at Cospoli.
He had persuaded the local council to lease him a house.

sense.def:
Kadar ima nekdo, ki je bil videti šibak ali neuspešen,
a new lease of life
, postane živahnejši ali uspešen.

seg.quote: After her marriage it was as though she'd got a new lease of life.
